channel.title: Uskaarj Off Topic Forum
channel.description: Be silly, have fun, but remember the basic forum rules.

item.title: Heya
item.author: invalid@example.com (maniac12ca)
item.dc:creator: maniac12ca
item.content:encoded: Right. Hi all.. again. My MIRC seems to not want to let me connect to any servers. So Ima try to stay in touch here.

item.title: about your april fools joke
item.author: invalid@example.com (zidane01970)
item.dc:creator: zidane01970
item.content:encoded: well you said it was a joke, and you said everything was back to normal, did you mean you just did the joke to take a 1 day break

item.title: A little help?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dakatsu)
item.dc:creator: Dakatsu
item.content:encoded:
Hey, sorry I dont see a troubleshooting area for Uskaarj2k4, so I'll put it here.
My problem is simple, I can't play the mod. When I load it up, it says cant spawn a GUI controller. Whats going on? Can someone please help me, I love the Skaarj storyline from Unreal, and a RTS was something that would be awesome, until I found this mod & my dreams came true. So do you know why this is happening?

item.title: greetings from Apprhension team
item.author: invalid@example.com (Lilguy)
item.dc:creator: Lilguy
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys, just wanted to say, your mod looks incredible, especially the buildings and units. I run the Apprehension mod, which also aims to bring rts elements to the Unreal engine. I'm jealous of your artistic resources
I haven't had a chance to download most of the other UT2k4 mods out there, but I'm definitely going to give yours a try.
Pity these types of mods don't get the same recognition as the ww2/counterstrike clones out there...
Best of luck!
Lilguy

item.title: crirical error?
item.author: invalid@example.com (defnot)
item.dc:creator: defnot
item.content:encoded:
Hi guys my problem is that when in start up Uskaarj for ut2004 it says this:



UT2004 Build UT2004_Build_[2004-11-11_10.48]

OS: Windows XP 5.1 (Build: 2600)
CPU: AuthenticAMD PentiumPro-class processor @ 2072 MHz with 1023MB RAM
Video: RADEON 9800 XT (6467)

Could not spawn a GUI Controller!

History: UGameEngine::Init <- InitEngine <- FMallocWindows::Free <- FMallocWindows::Free

what do i do ?? someone help me please

item.title: So close... yet so far...
item.author: invalid@example.com (isocryd)
item.dc:creator: isocryd
item.content:encoded:
I swear... I thought it said USkaarj2

U2Skaarj

Nonetheless, looks like a good model, and it comes with it's own mod and weapons.

item.title: A small wish o' mine
item.author: invalid@example.com (isocryd)
item.dc:creator: isocryd
item.content:encoded:
Say, couldn't the team smuggle in a few Quake2 (based) monsters, like, say... the tank, the gladiator or the icarus?

I mean, how could you possibly defend yourself with little marines against a horde of titans? There's a time when you need cluster rocket launchers

item.title: Halo
item.author: invalid@example.com (maniac12ca)
item.dc:creator: maniac12ca
item.content:encoded:
Who has played this game? I have on my friend's xbox..it has me frekaing addicted. At first i sucked..now im not bad..deadly with the pistol and its 2x scope. My favorite veichle is the Banshie..the one that flys in the air. Dog fights rule. Playing co-op is awaosme, i'm ehtier support or tank. Tank being i go in first and slaughter the covenat. I am feared by my firends in multiplayer. My psitol skills and running over skills(with the warthog) fear them Wel..there you ahve it barn...i...

Halo
